description: Designed and developed scalable web applications, building both frontend and backend systems to deliver high-performance, responsive experiences.
Implemented modular and reusable UI components using Angular and Next.js, translating design concepts into interactive interfaces with pixel-perfect fidelity.
Extended CMS capabilities with custom code and complex interactions, optimizing content management and platform flexibility.
Optimized API and data handling to ensure seamless real-time user experiences, collaborating closely with backend engineers and leveraging cloud services.
Integrated analytics, tracking, and visitor identification tools to improve engagement, conversions, and security without compromising user privacy.
Established development best practices, including code reviews, linting, onboarding tools, and reusable component libraries, boosting team productivity and maintainability.
Worked with product stakeholders to rapidly prototype, iterate, and prioritize features, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality solutions.
